betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The thaumonomicon is the magical guide to thaumic arts, and it holds all of its knowledge.
Each tab in the book refers to a different branch of the art.
Most of the knowledge in the book is hidden, and research needs to be performed to unlock such knowledge.
The requirements for each page are listed whenever they become available for discovery.
This knowledge can also be obtained through the chemicals held in Really Scary Vishrooms. They are indeed really scary, though, so be careful!
